Field.TextData: IF {DUMMY_VW_MAILSTATUSDETAILS.LEGSTA} = "CAN" THEN "Cancelled" ELSE IF {DUMMY_VW_MAILSTATUSDETAILS.LEGSTA} = "CRT" THEN "Live" ELSE IF {DUMMY_VW_MAILSTATUSDETAILS.LEGSTA} = "DEP" THEN "Departed" ELSE IF {DUMMY_VW_MAILSTATUSDETAILS.LEGSTA} = "TBA" THEN "To be Actioned" ELSE IF {DUMMY_VW_MAILSTATUSDETAILS.LEGSTA} = "TBC" THEN "To be Cancelled"

PropertyFormula.TextData: IF {DUMMY_VW_MAILSTATUSDETAILS.FLTNUM} = "-1" THEN FORMULA = TRUE ELSE FORMULA = FALSE
